project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program to perform basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Read CSV file and handle exceptions for file operations
Prompt user for numerical columns to analyze
Calculate mean for specified numerical columns
Calculate median for specified numerical columns
Calculate mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the functions - reading CSV, mean, median, and mode calculations
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
